ygData.subject: Status of Grim Aura
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello all. Is it possible to research grim aura. IE has anyone done it successfully? Also can you buy it? I heard it was for sale in either grobb or oggok at
ygData.messageBody:
Hello all.

Is it possible to research grim aura. IE has anyone done it successfully?
Also can you buy it? I heard it was for sale in either grobb or oggok at the
SK guild but a friend told me that the heard the spell was removed from the
vendor.

Is grim aura still a working spell and can I currently research or buy it?
Anyone with recent experience please respond.

I have one of the required components but am lacking the words of
divination.

I have successfully made feign death and restless bones so I know how the
research works, just not sure if the grim aura spell is researching
correctly or not and if it is still for sale or not.

Eloric Necromancer of the 5th Rank

Humble Knight - MoltenLava - Mithannial Marr

Sincerely
Mortifer

... Thanks Kenneth
